text:
I bought New Balance 860 from this shop. Excellent customer service and they all are very good about this product knowledge.
I visit many shops in Queensway shopping centre but they don't give the correct shoes for the customer just only ask the shoe size and give, but here they recommend the correct shoe either flat or arch foot. Thanks for your service guys.

I bought a pair of ASICS  for my son as school show via then on Shopee platform and it had some defect . Sports world was very fast to reach out and explain and  kind to allow exchange as they are just agent and will also let ASICS know . I could not change my review on Shopee but I want to assure via this review they are very good and nice to deal with . Do visit their shop at Queensway Shopping centre.

I bought a pair of ASICS shoes, and they’re fantastic! The fit is perfect, and they’re incredibly comfortable. The staff at the store were super friendly and made the whole process so smooth. I’m really happy with my purchase and will definitely be back for more!

Excellent Service from the staff, my daughter manage to find her Nike Basketball Shoes from this shop. This shop staff is also patient with my daughter trying out the size. As the shop over Queensway Shopping mall is limit for Nike Basketball Shoes.

We ordered a NC football jersey for our grandson for Christmas on December 14.  We had not heard anything about when it would arrive and worried we didn’t place the order do we placed the order again on December 29.  Then we discovered in our records that we did place the order so please cancel the order placed on December 29 and let us know when the original order will arrive.
